name: Bloodstractor Defender
description:
A game made for the October 2022 SodorJam. The theme was "Zelda Clone" 

I tried to match the perspective of Link to the Past, and put my own spin on the "Defend the Barn" mission from Majora's Mask

CONTROLS

w, a, s, d   -  movement

spacebar - swing weapon

Help Natey defend the Factory's Bloodstractor from a horde of rogue robots. Survive the wave to win! (20 enemies total)

------------------------------

What happened to these robots, and why are they coming out of the vents? Who sent them? No time for questions - Those corporate bloodsuckers will have your carapace if you don't protect the bloodstractor from being destroyed!
